overview: Barrett graduated from the University of New Hampshire with a B.A. in Political Science and shortly thereafter completed Reserve Officer Training Course to be commissioned into the New Hampshire Army National Guard as a logistics officer. Prior to joining Dexrex, he attended the Business Bridge Program at the Tuck School of Business at Dartmouth College during the summer of 2007. Barrett has coordinated all financial activities and has raised millions of dollars of investment while managing day-to-day operations. His goals are focused on maturing the corporate and financial structure of Dexrex to support long term growth.
